mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (title, contents, postType, author) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{postType}, #{author});
mapper.select: SELECT postID, title, boards.name as postTypeName, posts.creationTime, users.name as authorName, views FROM posts INNER JOIN boards ON (posts.postType = boards.boardID) INNER JOIN users ON (posts.author = users.userNum) WHERE postType=#{boardID} ORDER BY postID
